text: so this morning what we had to do was to
sit down and sort of structure an
approach to how we wanted to launch a
new product in the telecom market in the
United States in the process you come up
with a long list of products and
services that you could potentially
implement in Ghana as well none of us
had any background whatsoever but I
think it's not really about being an
expert in in let's say the telecom
industry itself it's more about
understanding how how to come up with an
idea you have such a diverse number of
backgrounds that everybody comes with a
very very unique perspective on the what
you try to propose at the beginning when
I came to HBS I was very concerned that
you know my ideas were being jaded like
my thoughts my own perspectives were
being changed all the time and for me
I'm a pretty stubborn person after some
time I learned to be much more open with
changing my perspective you know on the
spot that in itself has been a very good
learning experience to be able to take
constructive feedback very well it's
also a bonding experience overall I
think you know you become closer friends
and get to know each other a little bit
better
